attributes.action: Stop unfair Appraisals for Disabled employees in the Civil service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The appraisal system in the civil service which has been deemed unfair in the 1st place is even more unfair on disabled employees, 1 can be denied a pay scale increase for your grade because of longterm illness related/caused by your disability and there is nothing you can do, so effectively you are penelised for having a disability
